verses.name: Leviticus 16:6
verses.text: And Aaron shall offer his bullock of the sin offering, which is for himself, and make an atonement for himself, and for his house.

verses.name: Leviticus 16:7
verses.text: And he shall take the two goats, and present them before the Lord at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.

verses.name: Leviticus 16:8
verses.text: And Aaron shall cast lots upon the two goats; one lot for the Lord, and the other lot for the scapegoat.

verses.name: Leviticus 16:9
verses.text: And Aaron shall bring the goat upon which the Lord’s lot fell, and offer him for a sin offering.
